name: Coca-Cola Classic

description: Pepsi, a popular carbonated beverage with a bold, sweet, and refreshing taste.

description: Crisp, clean, and refreshing lemon-lime flavored soda, perfect for a refreshing drink.

description: Fanta Orange, a sweet and tangy carbonated beverage with the taste of real oranges.

description: Mountain Dew, a citrus-flavored soda with a bold and unique taste.

name: Dr Pepper
description: Dr Pepper, a unique blend of 23 flavors for a one-of-a-kind taste.

name: Root Beer A&W
